name: Art of Murder - Cards of Destiny
description: A vicious serial killer leaves aÂ trail of blood across America. He butchers his victims and leaves a card at the crime scene as his signature trademark. But he wants more! He triggers a psychotic face-off with the Federal Agent Nicole Bonnet, whose area of expertise is serial killers.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/VISTA/7/8/10 Processor: Intel Pentium 4 3,2 GHz, Intel Pentium D 2.66 GHz, AMD Athlon 64 3500+ Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce (6800/7600-7950/8600-8800/9600-9800/GTX 260-280) or Radeon (X1650-1950/HD2400-2900/3650-3870/4650-4870) DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: Sound card compatible with DirectX 9.0c Additional Notes: mouse, keyboard
